resources.string: Meta uses this information to verify your identity and to keep our community safe.You decide what personal details you make visible to others.
Manage your data, modify your legacy contact, and deactivate or delete your accounts and profiles.
Manage your mobile numbers and email addresses to make sure that your contact info is accurate and up to date.
Providing your date of birth helps make sure that you get the right experience for your age.
Manage your account privacy by toggling between public and private modes or delete your account permanently.
